intro:
Create the island of your dreams!
Paint the landscape by hand-placing tiles, trees, and more...or use the procedural generation tools!
description:
Create cozy islands while completing objectives to unlock new items & tools. Adjust the quantity of bridges, the maximum height of the terrain, and meticulously tweak configurations to create unique island worlds!

• Build your island
• Complete objectives
• Unlock new tools and items

Experience the feeling of painting the landscape, adjusting the island’s size and coastline with meticulous detail. Add trees, houses, bridges, rocks, animals, and much more!

The procedural toolset allows for detailed adjustments to be made for all facets of the island’s development. Adjust the quantity of bridges, the maximum height of the terrain, and even the proximity of trees to one another.

You’ll spend hours tweaking all the configurations to generate uniquely enthralling island worlds!
